title: Nadanthal Irandadi Lyrics Chembaruthi
stanzas:
Nadanthal irandadi
irundhaal naankadi
Nadanthal irandadi
irundhaal naankadi
paduthaal aaradi podhum
indha nilavum
andha vaanamum
adhu ellorukum sondham

rekkai ulla kunju idhu
koodu onnum thevaiyillai
buthi ulla pillai idhu
kettu nikka povathillai

theruvoram kidanthum
anaathai illai.
uravennai veruthaal
thinam tharuven thollai.

aanaikatti bore aditha
appa suppan kaanavillai.
andru mudhal indru varai
akkaramum vazhavillai.

vetta vetta vazhai thaan
adhu alli tharum vazhai thaan.
vetti poata mannuthaan
adhai katti kaaththaa
ponnuthaan.

naan vazhum vazhve
adhu sila kaalam thaan.
uravodu vazhnthaal
adhu pookolam thaan.

Nadanthal irandadi
irundhaal naankadi
Nadanthal irandadi
irundhaal naankadi
paduthaal aaradi podhum
indha nilavum
andha vaanamum
adhu ellorukum sondham

adi solladi gyanappenne
unmai solladi gyanapenne
solladi gyanappenne
unmai solladi gyanapenne
